content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ what s cozier on a chilly day than a warm cherry fair isle crochet hat and this pattern has the look of knitting but in crochet fair isle crochet has become more popular in recent years and i m here for it you can enjoy making garments that are not only functional for those warm months but stylish and modern as well **crochet along** if you are joining us for the colorwork collection cal then welcome if you ve not heard about it then please do join us for the month of october 2021 you ll find all the details you need here 1 a video tutorial is available for this hat https //youtu be/zedboudcbca 2 **crochet hook ** 5 0 mm h furls crochet hook 3 4 0mm g hook for ribbing if preffered **notions ** removable stitch marker 4 yarn needle to weave in ends 5 scissors 6 pompom 7 **yarn ** wool of the andes worsted 8 - 100% peruvian highland wool 110yds/50g one ball of each color 2 2 2 3 balls one of each color **yardage ** 95 yds - 150 yds **abbreviations/stitches ** blo - back loop only chain - chain slip_stitch - slip_stitch ssc - split single_crochet st s -stitch es **gauge** 13 sts by 15 row = 4x4 in ssc **measurements/sizes ** head circumference baby 16-17 41-43 cm toddler 18-19 46-48 cm child/small adult 20-21 51-53 cm adult 22-23 56-58 cm **skill level ** intermediate the pattern on the blog the free version of this pattern supported by advertisements can be found on my blog at http //www brianakdesigns com/ 11 let s be friends on social media website http //www brianakdesigns com/ 12 instagram https //www instagram com/brianakdesigns/ 13 facebook https //www facebook com/brianakdesigns/ 14 community group https //www facebook com/groups/brianak/ 15 pinterest https //www pinterest com/brianakdesigns/boards/ 16 youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucvqxin8ot3ndwb40iamipsw 17 when sharing projects on social media i love to see them please use #brianakdesigns #wecaugust21 #furlsinf821 it is much appreciated and loved © 2020 designed by briana kepner briana k designs all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are the property of briana k designs the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to briana k designs is not only greatly appreciated but smiled upon no part of this document may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from briana kepner you are welcome to sell finished items all patterns are copyrighted please do not copy sell or redistribute this pattern in any way all photographs in listing and patterns are not to be used for the sale of your item #humansthatyarn21 #cancerhatchallenge #wecrochet 1 https //www hanjancrochet com/classic-crochet-colorwork-collection 2 https //youtu be/zedboudcbca 3 https //furlscrochet com/products/furls-streamline-ergonomic-crochet-hooks-swirl#oid=1069 4 https //shrsl com/2boqv
